projectDesc.p: The Göttingen Register of Electronic Texts in Indian Languages (GRETIL) is a resource platform providing standardized machine-readable texts in Indian languages that have been contributed by various individuals and institutions.

correction.p: Apparent errors have been silently corrected.

normalization.p: GRETIL normalizes all texts contributed consistently for each language. Sanskrit texts are normalized in accordance with the scheme of the International Alphabet of Sanskrit Transliteration (IAST) in order to facilitate word search across its corpus without additional transformations.

All characters that were fully equivalent to an IAST-conformant character in the text file contributed have been made to conform to the character list below. Non-conformant characters with additional information including accents, capitalization, and whitespace have been preserved as orig elements inside choice elements with their IAST-conformant equivalent in reg elements for the creation of a plain text. These additional informations will be available only in those transformations of this file that display the original information.

lg.l: śriyaḥ pati śrīmati śāsituṃ jagajjagannivāso vasudevasadmani /
patatyadho dhāma visāri sarvataḥ kimedatityākulamīkṣitaṃ janaiḥ // 2 //
vibhurvibhaktāvayavaṃ pumāniti kramādamuṃ nārada ityabodhi saḥ // 3 //
mahāmahānīlaśilārucaḥ puro niṣedivān kaṃsakṛṣaḥ sa viṣṭare /
vidhāya tasyāpacitiṃ praseduṣaḥ prakāmamaprīyata yajvanāṃ priyaḥ /
jigāya jambūjanitaśriyaḥ śriyaṃ sumeruśṛṅgasya tadā tadāsanam // 19 //
vilocane bibhradadhiśritaśriṇī sa puṇḍarākākṣa iti sphuṭābhavat // 24 //
sitaṃsitimnā sutarāṃ munervapuḥ visāribhiḥ saudhamivātha lambhayan /
haratyaghaṃ saṃprati hetureṣyataḥ śubhasya pūrvācaritai kṛtarṃ śubhai /
prasahya tejobhirasaṃkhyatāṃ gatair adastvayā nunnamanuttamaṃ tamaḥ // 27 //
vilokanenaiva tavāmunā mune kṛtaḥ kṛtārthosmi nibarhitāṃhasā /
tathāpiśuśrūṣurahaṃ garīyasīrgiro 'thavā śreyasi kena vā tṛpyate // 29 //
itibruvantaṃ uvāca sa vratī na vācyamitthaṃ puruṣottama tvayā /
tvameva sākṣātkaraṇīya ityataḥ kimasti kāryaṃ guru yogināmapi // 31 //
bahirvikaraṃ prakṛteḥ pṛthagviduḥ purātanaṃ tvāṃ puruṣaṃ purāvidaḥ // 33 //
samāhitairapyanirūpitastataḥ padaṃ dṛśaḥ syāḥ katham īśa mādṛśām // 37 //
ṛte raveḥ kṣālayituṃ kṣameta kaḥ kṣapātamaskāṇḍamalīmasaṃ tamaḥ // 38 //
karoti kaṃsādimahībhṛtāṃ vadhājjano mṛgāṇāmiva yattava stavam /
pravṛtta eva svayamujjhiśramaḥ krameṇa peṣṭuṃ bhuvanadvaṣāmasi /
tathāpi vācālatayā yunakti māṃ mithastvadābhāṣaṇalolupaṃ manaḥ // 40 //
diśāmadhīśāṃścaturo yataḥ surānapāsya taṃ rāgāhṛtāḥ siṣevire /
purāṇi durgāṇi niśātamāyudhaṃ balāni śūrāṇi ghanāścakañcukāḥ /
sa saṃcariṣṇu bhuvanāntareṣu yāṃ yadṛcchayāśiśriyādāśrayaḥ śriyaḥ /
saṭācchaṭabhinnaghanena bibhratā nṛsiṃha saiṃhīmatanuṃ tanuṃ tvayā /
vinodamicchannatha darpajanmano raṇena kaṇḍvāstridaśai samaṃ punaḥ /
sa rāvaṇo nāma nikāmabhīṣaṇaṃ babhūva rakṣaḥ kṣatarakṣaṇaṃ divaḥ // 48 //
samutkṣipanyaḥ pṛthivībhṛtāṃ varaṃ varapradānasya cakāra śūlinaḥ /
purīmavaskanda lunīhi nandanaṃ muṣāṇa ratnāni harāmarāṅganāḥ /
vigṛhya cakre namucidviṣā balī ya itthamasvāsthyamahardivaṃ divaḥ // 51 //
anudrutaḥ saṃyati yena kevalaṃ balasya śatruḥ praśaśaṃsa śīghratām // 52 //
nirastaghāṃbhīryamapāstapuṣpakaṃ prakampayāmāsa na mānasaṃ na saḥ // 55 //
na jātu vaināyakamekamuddhṛtaṃ viṣāṇamadyāpi punaḥ prarohati // 60 //
tamiddhamārādhayituṃ sakarṇakaiḥ kulairna bheje phaṇināṃ bhujaṅgatā // 63 //
tapena varṣāḥ śaradā himāgamo vasantalakṣmyā śiśiraḥ sametya ca /
prasūnakḷptiṃ dadhataḥ sadartavaḥ purosya vāstavyakuṭumbitāṃ yayau // 66 //
amānavaṃ jātamajaṃ kule manoḥ prabhāvinaṃ bhāvinnamantamātmanaḥ /
mumoca jānannapi jānakīṃ na yaḥ sadabhimānaikadhanā hi māninaḥ // 67 //
tirohitātmā śiśupālasaṃjñayā pratīyate saṃprati sāpyasaḥ paraiḥ // 69 //
sa bāla āsīdvapuṣā caturbhujo mukhena pūrṇendunibhastrilocanaḥ /
omityuktavato 'tha śāṅgiṇā iti vyāhṛtya vācaṃ nabhastasminnutpatite puraḥ suramunāvindoḥ śriyaṃ bibhrati /
śatruṇāmaniśa vināśapiśunaḥ kruddhasya caidyaṃ prati vyomni bhrakuṭicchalena vadane ketuśacakārāspadam // 75 //
samau hi śiṣṭairāmnātau vartsyantāvāmayaḥ sa ca // 10 //
kṛtakṛtyo vidhirmanye na vardhayanti tasya tām // 32 //
virāddha evaṃ bhamatā virāddhā bahudhā ca naḥ /
manāganabhyavṛtyā vā kāmaṃ kṣāmyatatu yaḥ kṣamī /
anyadā bhūṣaṇaṃ puṃsaḥ kṣamā lajjeva yoṣitaḥ /
vayaṃ hanāma dviṣataḥ sarvaḥ svārthaṃ samīhate // 65 //
sopadhānāṃ dhiyaṃ dhīrāḥ stheyasīṃ khaṭvayanti ye /
tatrāniśaṃ niṣamṇṇāste jānate jātu na śramaṃm // 77 //
tejaḥ kṣamā vā naikāntaṃ kālajñasya mahīpateḥ /
tasya mitrāṇyamitrāste ye ca ye cobhaye nṛpāḥ /
tīkṣṇā nāruntudā buddhiḥ karma śāntaṃ pratāpavat /
ya ihātmavido vipakṣamadhye saha saṃvṛddhiyujo 'pi bhūbhujaḥ syuḥ /
kauberadigbhāgam apāsya mārgam āgastyam iva āśuḥ iva avatārṇaḥ /
jagatpavitraiḥ api taṃ na pādaiḥ spraṣṭuṃ jagatpūjyam ayujyata arkaḥ /
yāṃ yāṃ priyaḥ praikṣata kātarāśkṣīṃ sā sā hriyā namramukhī babhūva /
nityaṃ hareḥ saṃnihitā nikāmaṃ modayati sma cetaḥ // 18 //
na kevalaṃ yaḥ svatayā murārerasādhāraṇatāṃ dadhānaḥ /
mahārathaḥ puṣyarathaṃ rathāṅgī kṣipraṃ kṣapānātha ivādhirūḍhaḥ // 22 //
yataḥ sa bhartā jagatāṃ jagāma dhartrā dharitryāḥ phaṇinātato 'dhaḥ /
anekaśaḥ saṃstutamapyanalpā navaṃ navaṃ pratiraho karoti // 31 //
rathasya tasyāṃ puri dattacakṣurvidvānvidāmāsa śanairna yātam // 32 //
anirvidā yā vidadhe vidhātrā pṛthivī pṛthivyāḥ pratiyātaneva // 34 //
āruhya nāryaḥ kṣaṇadāsu yatra nabhogatā devya iva vyārājan // 43 //
ramyā iti prāptavatīḥ patākā rāgaṃ viviktā iti vardhayantīḥ /
yāṃ revatījāniriyeṣa hātuṃ na rauhiṇīyo na ca rohiṇīśaḥ // 60 //
viśeṣako vā viśiśeṣa yasyāḥ śriyantrilokītilakaḥ sa eva // 62 //
nirantarāle 'pi vimucmāne dūraṃ pathi prāṇabhṛtāṃ gaṇena /
turagaśatākulasya paritaḥ paramekaturaṅgajanmanaḥ pramathitabhūbhṛtaḥ pratipathaṃ mathitasya bhṛśaṃ mahībhṛtā /
paricalataḥ balānujabalasya puraḥ satataṃ dhṛtaśriyaściravigataśriyo jalanidheśca tadābhavadadantaraṃ mahat // 82 //
sahasrasaṃkhyair gaganaṃ pādair bhuvaṃ vyāpya vitiṣṭhamānam /
utkaṃ dharaṃ draṣṭumavekṣya śauriṇutkandharaṃ dāruka ityuvāca // 18 //
mūrdhniskhalattuhinadīdhitikoṭimenam udvīkṣya ko bhuvi na vismayate nageśam // 19 //
vahati yaḥ paritaḥ kanakasthalīḥ saharitā lasamānanavāṃśukaḥ /
dhūmākāraṃ dadhati puraḥ sauvarṇe varṇenāgneḥ sadṛśi taṭe paśyāmī /
śreyāndvijātiriva hantumaghāni dakṣaṃ gūṭhārthameṣa nidhimantragaṇaṃ bibharti // 37 //
bimboṣṭhaṃ bahu manute turaṅgavaktraś cumbantaṃ mukhamiha kiṃnaraṃ priyāyāḥ /
varjayantyā janaiḥ saṃgamekāntatas tarkayantyā sukhaṃ saṅgame kāntataḥ /
yā na yayau priyamanyavadhūbhyaḥ sāratarāgamanā yatamānam /
tena saheta bibharti rasaḥ strī sā ratarāgamanāyatānām // 45 //
doṣāpi nūnamahimāṃśurasau kileti vyākośakokanadatāṃ dadhate nalinyaḥ // 46 //
anuroditīva karuṇena pattriṇāṃ virutena vatsalatayayaiṣa nimnagāḥ // 47 //
khyātiṃ casattvapuruṣānyatayādhigamya vāñcanti tāmapi samādhibhṛtaḥ niroddhum // 55 //
arkopalollasitavahnibhirahni taptās tīvraṃ mahāvratamivātra caranati vaprāḥ // 58 //
etasminnadhikapayaḥśriyaṃ vahantyaḥ saṃkṣobhaṃ pavanabhuvā javena nītāḥ /
iha muhurmuditaiḥ kalabhai ravaḥ pratidiśaṃ kriyate kalabhairavaḥ /
sphurati cānuvanaṃ camarīcayaḥ kanakaratnabhuvāṃ ca marīcayaḥ // 60 //
prītyai yūnāṃ vyavahitatapanāḥ prauḍhadvāntaṃ dinamiha jaladāḥ /
bhagne nivāso 'yamihāsya puṣpaiḥ sadānataḥ yena viṣāṇi nāgaḥ /
tīvrāṇi tenojjhati kopito 'sau sasānatoyena viṣāṇi nāgaḥ // 63 //
niṣevya madhu mādhavāḥ sarasamatra kādambaraṃ haranti rataye rahaḥ priyatamāṅgakādambaram // 66 //
darpaṇanirmalāsu patite ghanatimiramuṣi jyotiṣi raupyabhittiṣu puraḥ pratiphalati muhuḥ /
vrīḍamasaṃṃmukho 'pi ramaṇairapahṛtavasanāḥ khāñcanakandarāsu taruṇīriha nayati raviḥ // 67 //
itthaṃ vyalīkāḥ priyatamā iva so 'vyalīkaḥ śuśrāva sūtatanayasya tadā vyalīkāḥ /
rantuṃ nirantaramiyeṣa tato 'vasāne tāsāṃ girau ca vanarājipaṭaṃ vasāne // 1 //
ārakṣamagnamavamatya sṛṇiṃ śitāgram ekaḥ palāyata javena kṛtārtanādaḥ /
nāgaṃ punarmṛdu salīlanimīlitākṣaṃ sarvaḥprayaḥ khalu bhavatayanurūpaceṣṭaḥ // 6 //
parntavartmasu vcakramire mahāśvāḥ śailasya dardurapuṭāniva vādayantaḥ // 9 //
ucchidya vidviṣa iva prasrabhaṃ mṛgendrān indrānujācarabhūtapatayo 'dhyavātsuḥ /
chāyāmapāsya mahatīmapi vartamānām āgāminīṃ jagṛhire janatāsrūṇām /
yānto 'nyataḥ plutakṛtasvaramāśu dūrād udbāhunā juhuvavire muhurātmavargyāḥ // 15 //
āliṅganānyadhikṛtāḥ sphuṭamāpureva gaṇḍasthalīḥ śucitayā na cucumburāsām // 18 //
yāvatsa eva samayaḥ samameva tāvad avyākulāḥ paṭamayānyabhito vitatya /
trāsākulaḥ paripatanparito niketān puṃbhirna kaiścidapi dhanvabhiranvabandhi /
tasthau tathāpi na mṛgaḥ kvacidaṅganānām ākarṇapūrṇanayaneṣuhatekṣaṇaśrīḥ // 26 //
ātmānameva jaladheḥ pratibimbitāṅgam ūrmau mahatyabhimukhāpātitaṃ nirīkṣya /
ruddhe gajena saritaḥ saruṣāvatāre riktodapātrakaramāsta ciraṃ janaughaḥ // 33 //
panthānamāśu vijahīhi puraḥ stanau te paśyanpratidvaradakumbhaviśaṅgicetāḥ /
dravyaśrayeṣvapi gaṇeṣu rarāja nīlo varṇaḥ pṛthaggata ivāligaṇo gajasya // 38 //
yāṃ candrakairmadajalasya mahānadīnāṃ netraśriyaṃ vikasato vidadhurgajendrāḥ /
roddhuṃ mahebhaparivraḍhimānamāgād ākrantito na vaśameti mahānparasya // 41 //
nābhāji kevalamabhāji gajena śākhī nānyasya gandhamapi mānabhataḥ sahante // 42 //
senāgajena mathitasya nijaprasūnair mamle yathāgatamagāmi kulairalīnām // 43 //
bandhāya cicchiduribhāstarasātmanaiva naivātmanīnamatha vā kriyate madāndhaiḥ // 44 //
kaṇḍūyataḥ kaṭubhuvaṃ kariṇo madena skandhaṃ sugandhimanulīnavatā nagasya /
śikṣāvaśena śanakairvaśamānināya śāśtraṃ hi niścitadhiyāṃ kva na siddhameti // 47 //
stambhaṃ mahāntamucitaṃ sahasā mumoca dānaṃ dadāvatitarāṃ sarasāgrahastaḥ /
gambhīravedini puraḥ kavalaṃ karīndre mando 'pi nāma na mahānavagṛhya sādhyaḥ // 49 //
kṣiptaṃ puro na jagṛhe muhurikṣukāṇḍaṃ nāpekṣate sma nikaṭopagatāṃ kareṇuṃ /
gatyūnamargagatayo 'pi gatorumārgāḥ svairaṃ samācakṛṣire bhuvi vellanāya /
nāsāvirokapavanollasitaṃ tanīyo romāñcatāmiva jagāma rajaḥ pṛthivyāḥ // 54 //
hemnaḥ sthalīṣu paritaḥ parivṛtya vājī dhunvanvapuḥ pravitatāyatakeśapaṅktiḥ /
aśrāvi bhūmipatibhiḥ kṣaṇavītanidrair aśnunpuro haritakaṃ mudamādadhānaḥ /
utkhāya darpacalitena sahaiva rajjvā kīlaṃ prayatnaparamānavadurgraheṇa /
siddhaṃ mukhe navasu vāthiṣu kaścidaśvaṃ valgāvibhāgakuśalo gamayāṃbabhūva // 60 //
ucchṛṅgitānyavṛṣabhā saritāṃ nadanto rodhāṃsi dhīramapacaskirire mahokṣāḥ // 63 //
dāserakaḥsapadi saṃvalitaṃ niṣādair vipraṃ purā patagarāḍiva nirjagāra // 66 //
spaṣṭaṃ bahiḥ sthitavaterapi nivedayantaś ceṣṭāviśeṣamanujīvijanāya rājñām /
dharasyoddhartāsitvamitinanu sarvatra jagati pratītastatkiṃ māmatibharamadhaḥ prāpipāyiṣuḥ /
ṛtugaṇena niṣevitumādadhe bhuvi padaṃ vipadantakṛtaṃ satāṃ // 1 //
virahiṇāṃ hṛdayasya bhidābhṛtaḥ kapiśitaṃ piśitaṃ madanāgninā // 5 //
nipātitāḥ paritaḥ pathikavrajānupari te paritepurato bhṛśam // 6 //
alamaleriva gandharasāvamū mama na saumanasau manaso mude // 12 //
ajagaṇan gaṇaśaḥ priyamagrataḥ praṇatamapyabhimānitayā na yāḥ /
priyatayā gaditāstvayi bāndhavairavitathā vitathāḥ sakhi mā giraḥ // 18 //
abhisasāra na vallabhamaṅganā na cakame ca kamekarasaṃ rahaḥ // 26 //
vigatarāgaguṇo 'pi jano na kaścalati vāti payodanabhasvati /
jalajarājiṣu naindramadidravanna mahatāmahatāḥ kva ca nārayaḥ // 43 //
samaya eva karoti balābalaṃ praṇigatavanta itīva śarīriṇām /
madhuriporabhitāmramukhī mudaṃ divi tatā vitatāna śukāvaliḥ // 53 //
priyatamena yayā saruṣā sthitaṃ na saha sā sahasā parirabhya tam /
ślathayituṃ kṣaṇamakṣamatāmaṅganā na saha sā sahasā kṛtavepathuḥ // 57 //
himaṛtāvapi tāḥ sma bhṛśasvido yuvatayaḥ sutarāmupakāriṇau /
śiśiramāsamapāsya guṇosya naḥ ka iva śītaharasya kucoṣmaṇaḥ /
iti dhiyāstaruṣaḥ parirebhire ghanamato namato 'numatān priyāḥ // 65 //
priyamāpa divāpi kokile strī paritastārarave rasatvaśyam // 70 //
mudamabdabhuvāmapāṃ mayūrāḥ sahasāyanta nadī papāṭa lābhe /
kuṭajāni vīkṣya śikhibhiḥ śikharīndraṃ samayāvanau ghanamadabhramarāṇi /
gaganaṃ ca gītaninadasya giroccaiḥ samayā vanaughanamadabhramarāṇi // 73 //
abhīṣṭhamāsādya cirāya kāle samuddhṛtāśāṃ kamanī cakāśe /
stanayoḥ samayena yāṅganānāmabhinaddhārasamā na sā rasena /
tatsamparka prāpya purā mohanalīlāṃ kāmekānte sā rasikā kā kurute na // 76 //
kāntājanena rahasi prasabhaṃ gṛhītakeśe rate smarasahāsavatopitena /
premṇā manastu rajanīṣvapi haimanīṣu ke śerate sma rasahāsavatopitena // 77 //
kurvantamityatibhareṇa nagānavācaḥ puṣpaivirāmamalināṃ ca na gānavācaḥ /
śrīmānsamastamanusānu girauvihartu bibhratyacodi sa mayūragirā vihartum // 79 //
niragamadabhirāddhumadṛtānāṃ bhavati mahatsu na niṣphalaḥ prayāsaḥ // 1 //
dadhati sumanaso vanāni bahvīryuvatiyutā yadavaḥ prayātumīṣuḥ /
tava sapadi samīpamānaye tāmahamiti tasya mayāgrato 'bhyadhāyi /
na ca sutanu na vedmi yanmahīyānasunirasastava niścayaḥ pareṇa /
vitathayati na jānātu madvaco 'sāviti ca tathāpi sakhīṣu me 'bhimānaḥ // 8 //
tvayi taditi virodhaniścitāyāṃ bhavati bhavatvasuhṛjjanaḥ sakāmaḥ // 9 //
praṇayati yadi na prasādabuddhirbhava mama mānini jīvite dayāluḥ // 10 //
drutapadamiti mā vayasya yāsirnanu sutanuṃ paripālayānuyāntīm /
yadi mayi laghimānamāgatāyāṃ tava dhṛtirasti gatāsmi sampratīyam /
marudavaniruhāṃ rajo vadhūbhyaḥ mupaharan vicakāra korakāṇi // 26 //
sapadi taruṇapallavena vadhvā vigatadayaṃ khalu khaṇḍitena mamle // 31 //
atha kila kathite sakhībhiratra kṣaṇamapareva sasaṃbhramā bhavantī /

adyāpi senāturagāḥ savismayairalūnapakṣā iva menire janaiḥ // 17 //
pādaiḥ puraḥ kūbariṇāṃ vidāritāḥ prakāmamākrāntatalāstato gajaiḥ /
kṣiptāvarodhāṅganamutpathena gāṃ vilaṅghya laghvīṃ karabhau babhañjatuḥ // 24 //
srastāṅgasandhau vigatāśāpāṭave rujā nikāmaṃ vikalīkṛte rathe /
āptena tatkṣaṇā bhiṣajeva tatkṣaṇaṃ pracakrame laṅghanapūrvakaḥ kramaḥ // 25 //
sthāṇau niṣaṅgiṇyanasi kṣaṇaṃ puraḥ śuśoca lābhāya kṛtakrayo vaṇik // 26 //
uttaṅgamātaṅgajitālaghūpalo balaiḥ sa paścātkiyate sma bhūdharaḥ // 27 //
tasthemuhūrta hariṇīvilocanaiḥ sadṛśi dṛṣṭvā nayanāni yoṣitām /
nimnāni duḥkhādavatārya sādibhiḥ sayatnamākṛṣṭakaśāḥ śanaiḥ śanaiḥ /
dākṣyaṃ hi sadyaḥ phaladaṃ yadagrataścakhāda dāserayuvā vanāvalīḥ // 32 //
ślokānupendrasya puraḥ sma bhūyaso guṇānsamuddiśya paṭhanti vandinaḥ // 35 //
paśyankṛtārthairapi vallavījano janādhināthaṃ na yayau vitṛṣṇatām /
vardhiṣṇudhārādhvani rohiṇīḥ payaściraṃ nidadhau duhataḥ sa goduhaḥ // 40 //
gītāni gopyāḥ kalamaṃ mṛgavrajo na nūnamattīti harivyalokayat // 43 //
prāyeṇa nīcānapi medinībhṛto janaḥ samenaiva pathādhirohati /
senā murāreḥ patha eva sā punarmahāmahīdhrānparito 'dhyarohayat // 46 //
sāvajñamunmīlya vilocane sakṛtkṣaṇaṃ mṛjendreṇa suṣupsunā punaḥ /
sainyānna yātaḥ samayāpi vivyathe kathaṃ surājaṃbhavamanmathāthavā // 52 //
śmaśrūyamāṇe maghujālake tarorgajena gaṇḍaṃ kaṣatā vidhūnite /
sa vyāptavatyā parito 'pathānyapi svasenayā sarvapathīnayā tayā /
ambhobhirullaṅghita tuṅgarodhasaḥ pratīpanāmnīḥ kurute sma nimnagāḥ // 57 //
kṣiptaṃ samīraiḥ saritāṃ puraḥ patajjalānyanaiṣīdraja eva paṅkatām // 58 //
senā sudhākṣālitasaudhasaṃpadāṃ purāṃ bahūnāṃ parabhāgamāpa sā // 62 //
nūnaṃ sahānena viyogaviklavā puraḥ puraśrīrapi niryayau tadā // 63 //
yā gharmabhānostanayāpi śītalaiḥ svasā yamasyāpi janasya jīvanaiḥ /
yasyā mahānīlataṭīriva drutāḥ prayānti pītvā himapiṇḍapāṇḍurāḥ /
vyaktaṃ balīyān yadi heturāgamādapūrayatsā jaladhiṃ na jāhnavī /
abhyudyatasya kramituṃ javena gāṃ tamālanīlā girāṃ dhṛtāyatiḥ /
sīmeva sā tasya puraḥ kṣaṇaṃ babhau balāmburāśermahato mahāpagā // 70 //
tatpūrvamaṃsadvayasaṃ dvipādhipāḥ kṣaṇaṃ sahelāḥ parito jagāhire /
tīrtvā janenaiva nitāntadustarāṃ nadīṃ pratijñāmiva tāṃ garīyasīm /
avaloka eva nṛpateḥ sma dūrato rabhasādrathādavatarītumicchataḥ /
bhuvanairnato 'pi vihitāttmagauravaḥ praṇanāma nāma tanayaṃ pitṛṣvasuḥ // 8 //
mukuṭāṃśurañjitaparāgamagrataḥ sa na yāvadāpa śirasā mahītalam /
na mamau kapāṭataṭavistṛtaṃ tanau muravairimavakṣa urasi kṣamābhujaḥ /
śirasi sma jighrati surāribandhane chalavāmanaṃ vinayavāmanaṃ tadā /
dadhire pṛthakkariṇa eva dūrato mahatāṃ hi sarvamathavā janātigam // 17 //
vaśinaṃ kṣiterayanayāviveśvaraṃ niyamo yamaśca niyataṃ yatiṃ yathā /
ruruce himācalaguhāmukhonmukhaḥ payasāṃ pravāha iva saurasaindhavaḥ // 27 //
puruṣaḥ puraṃ praviśati sma pañcabhiḥ samamindriyairiva narendrasūnubhiḥ // 28 //
pramadāśca yatra khalu rājayakṣmaṇaḥ parato niśākaramanoramairmukhaiḥ // 29 //
vihitopaśobhamupayāti mādhave nagaraṃ vyarocata patākayeva tat // 36 //
abhavatprasāditasuro mahotsavaḥ pramadājanasya sa cirāya mādhavaḥ // 38 //
vipulena sāgaraśayasyakukṣiṇā bhuvanāni yasya papire yugakṣaye /
madavibhramāsakalayā pape punaḥ sa purastriyaikatamayaikayā dṛśā // 40 //
abhiyāti naḥ satṛṣa eva cakṣuṣo harirityakhidyata nitambinījanaḥ /
na viveda yaḥ satatamenamīkṣate na vitṛṣṇatāṃ vrajati khalvasāvapi // 46 //
gatamacyutena saha śūnyatāṃ gataḥ pratipālayanmana ivāṅganājanaḥ // 47 //
alasairmadena sudṛśaḥ śarīrakaiḥ svagṛhānprati pratiyayuḥ śanaiḥ śanaiḥ /
upanīya bindusaraso mayena yā maṇidāru cāru kila vārṣaparvaṇam /
viśadāśmakūṭaghaṭitāḥ kṣapākṛtaḥ kṣaṇadāsu yatra ca rucekatāṃ gatāḥ /
nalinī nigūḍhasalilā ca yatra sā sthalamityadhaḥ patati yā suyodhane /
navahāṭakeṣṭakacitaṃ dadarśa sa kṣitipasya pastyamatha tatra saṃsadi /
yadunandanena tadudanvataḥ payaḥ śasineva rājakulamāpa nandathum // 65 //
sakale ca tatra gṛhamāgate harau nagare 'pyakālamahamādideśa saḥ /
mahatīmapi śriyamavāpya vismayaḥ sujano na vismarati jātu kiñcana // 68 //
lajjate na gaditaḥ priyaṃ paro vaktureva bhavati trapādhikā /
toṣameti vitathaiḥ stavaiḥ paraste ca tasya sulabhāḥ śarīribhiḥ /
asti na stutivaco 'nṛtaṃ tava stotrayogyana ca tena tuṣyasi // 3 //
bahvapi priyamayaṃ tava bruvanna vrajatyanṛtavāditāṃ janaḥ /
sā vibhūtiranubhāva sampadāṃ bhūyasī tava yadāyatāyati /
etadūḍhagurubhāra bhārataṃ varṣamadya mama vartate vaśe // 5 //
mūlatāmupagate prabho tvayi prāpi dharmamayavṛkṣatā mayā // 6 //
tvaṃ samīraṇa iva pratīkṣitaḥ karṣakeṇa valajānpupūṣatā // 7 //
pūrvamaṅga juhudhi tvameva vā snātavatyavabhṛthe tatastvayi /
śādhi śāsaka jagattrayasya māmāśravo 'smi bhavataḥ sahānujaḥ // 11 //
kiṃ parasya sa guṇaḥ samaśnute pathyavṛttirapi yadyarogitām // 13 //
tatsurājñi bhavati sthite punaḥ kaḥ kratuṃ yajatu rājalakṣaṇam /
uddhṛtau bhavati kasya vā bhuvaḥ śrīvarāhamapahāya yogyatā // 14 //
śāsane 'pi guruṇi vyavasthitaṃ kṛtyavastuṣu niyuṅkṣva kāmataḥ /
tvatprayojanaghanaṃ dhanañjayādanya eva iti māṃ ca māvagāḥ // 15 //
yastaveha savane na bhūpatiḥ karma karmakaravatkariṣyati /
tasya neṣyati vapuḥ kabandhatāṃ bandhureva jagatāṃ sudarśanaḥ // 16 //
ityudīritagiraṃ nṛpastvayi śreyasi sthitavati sthirā mama /
tasya sāṃkhyapuruṣeṇa tulyatāṃ bibhrataḥ svayamakurvataḥ kriyāḥ /
saṃśayāya dadhatoḥ sarūpatā dūrabhinnaphalayoḥ kriyāṃ prati /
tatra mantrapavitaṃ haviḥ kratāvaśnato na vapureva kevalam /
sparśamuṣṇamucitaṃ dadhacchikhī yaddadāha haviradbhutaṃ na tat /
dyāmiyāya dahanasya ketanaḥ kīrtayanniva divaukasāṃ priyam // 28 //
rājataḥ pupuvire nirenasaḥ prāpya te 'pi vimalaṃ pratigraham // 35 //
eka eva vasu yaddadau nṛpastatsamāpakamatarkyata kratoḥ /
prema tasya na guṇeṣu nādhikaṃ na sma veda na guṇāntaraṃ ca saḥ /
ditsayā tadapi pārthivo 'rthinaṃ guṇyaguṇya iti na vyajīgaṇat // 47 //
icchatāśitumanāśuṣā na ca pratyagāmi tadupeyuṣā sadaḥ // 49 //
rakṣitāramiti tatra karmaṇi nyasya duṣṭadamanakṣamaṃ harim /
itthamatra vitatakrame kratau vīkṣya dharmamatha gharmajanmanā /
ātmanaiva guṇadoṣakovidaḥ kiṃ na vetsi karaṇīyavastuṣu /
yattathāpi na gurūnnapṛcchasi tvaṃ kramo 'yamiti tatra kāraṇam // 54 //
snātakaṃ gurumabhīṣṭamṛtvijaṃ saṃyujā ca saha medinīpatim /
arghabhāja iti kīrtayanti ṣaṭ te ca te yugapadāgatāḥ sadaḥ // 55 //
aṃśa eṣa janatātivartino vedhasaḥ pratijanaṃ kṛtasthiteḥ // 59 //
padmabhūriti sṛjañjagadrajaḥ satvamacyuta iti sthitiṃ nayan /
bibhrate bhuvamadhaḥ sadātha ca brahmaṇo 'pyupari tiṣṭhate namaḥ // 65 //
kevalaṃ dadhati kartṛvācinaḥ pratyayāniha na jātu karmaṇi /
gacchataḥ sma madhukaiṭabhau vibhoryasya naidrasukhavighnatāṃ kṣaṇam // 68 //
janma bibhratamajaṃ navaṃ budhā yaṃ purāṇapuruṣaṃ pracakṣate // 70 //
kiṃ kramiṣyati kilaiṣa vāmano yāvaditthamahasanna dānavāḥ /
tāvadasya na mamau nabhastale laṅghitārkaśaśimaṇḍalaḥ kramaḥ // 75 //
yaḥ surairiti suraughavallabho ballavaiśca jagade jagatpatiḥ // 83 //
yaṃ sametya ca lalāṭalekhayā bibhrataḥ sapadi śaṃbhuvibhramam /
yaḥ kolatāṃ ballavatāṃ ca bibhraddaṃṣṭrāmudasyāśu bhujāṃ ca gurvīm /
dhanyo 'si yasya harireṣa samakṣa eva dūrādapi kratuṣu yajvabhirijyate yaḥ /
bhīṣmoktaṃ taditi vaco niśamya samyak sāmrājyaśriyamadhigacchatā nṛpeṇa /
datter'dhe mahati mahībhṛtāṃ puro 'pi trailokye madhubhidabhūdanargha eva // 88 //
mānamasahata na cedipatiḥ paravṛddhimatsari mano hi māninām // 1 //
pura eva śārṅgiṇi savairamatha punaramuṃ tadarcayā /
iti cakrudhe bhṛśamanena nanu mahadavāpya vipriyam /
prema vilasati mahattadaho dayitaṃ janaḥ khalu guṇīti manyate // 14 //
grāmyamṛga iva havistadayaṃ bhajate jvalatsu na mahīśavahniṣu // 15 //
anṛtāṃ giraṃ na gadasīti jagati paṭahairvighuṣyase /
tava dharmarāja iti nāma kathamidamapaṣṭhu paṭhyate /
yadi vārcanīyatama eṣa kimapi bhavatāṃ pṛthāsutāḥ /
nīci niyatamiha yaccapalo nirataḥ sphuṭaṃ bhavasi nimnagāsutaḥ // 21 //
pratipattumaṅga ghaṭate ca na tava nṛpayogyamarhaṇam /
kṛṣṇa kalaya nanu ko 'hamiti sphuṭamāpadāṃ padamanātmaveditā // 22 //
asurastvayā nyavadhi ko 'pi madhuriti kathaṃ pratīyate /
cakradhara iti rathāṅgamadaḥ satataṃ bibharṣi bhuvaneṣu rūḍhaye // 26 //
vyomni kathamapi cakartha padaṃ vyapadiśyate jagati vikramītyataḥ // 28 //
pṛthivīṃ bibhartha yadi pūrvamidamapi guṇāya vartate /
tvayi pūjanaṃ jagati jālma kṛtamidamapākṛte guṇaiḥ /
asya vanaśuna ivāpacitiḥ paribhāva eva bhavatāṃ bhuvo 'dhipāḥ // 34 //
avadhījjanaṅgama ivaiṣa yadi hatavṛṣo vṛṣaṃ nanu /
sparśamaśucivapurarhati na pratimānanāṃ tu nitarāṃ nṛpocitām // 35 //
yadi nāṅganeti matirasya mṛdurajani pūtanāṃ prati /
stanyamaghṛṇamanasaḥ pibataḥ kila dharmato bhavati sā jananyapi // 36 //
karma yadayamakarottaralaḥ sthiracetasāṃ ka iva tena vismayaḥ // 37 //
satyaniyatavacasaṃ vacasā sujanaṃ janāścalayituṃ ka īśate // 40 //
na cataṃ tadeti śapamānamapi yadunṛpāḥ pracukrudhuḥ /
tasya katitha iti tatprathamaṃ manasā samākhyadaparādhamacyutaḥ // 42 //
smāha calayati bhuvaṃ maruti kṣubhitasya nādamanukurvadambudheḥ // 44 //
yasya namayatu sa cāpamayaṃ caraṇaḥ kṛtaḥ śirasi sarvabhūbhṛtām // 46 //
vastu kiyadidamayaṃ na mṛdhe mama kevalamasya mukhamīkṣituṃ kṣamaḥ // 64 //
yātu nikaṣamadhiyuddhamasau vacanena kiṃ bhavatu sādhvasādhu vā // 65 //
abhidhāya rūkṣamiti mā sma gama iti pṛthāsuteritām /
vācamanunayaparāṃ sa tataḥ sahasāvakarṇya niriyāya saṃsadaḥ // 67 //
kṣaṇamīkṣataḥ pathi janena kimidamiti jalpatā mithaḥ /
bhūminabhasi rabhasena yatī virarāja kācana samaṃ maholkayā // 92 //
yāntamanimiṣamatṛptamanāḥ patimīkṣate sma bhṛśayā dṛśaḥ pathaḥ // 94 //
sadyaḥ prasahya dvitayena netrayoḥ pratyācacakṣe galatā bhaṭastriyāḥ // 95 //
kācitkīrṇā rajobhirdivamanuvidadhe bhinnavaktrendulakṣmīr aśrīkāḥ kāścidantardiśa iva dadhire dāhamudbhrāntasatvāḥ /
bhremurvātyā ivānyāḥ pratipadamaparā bhūmivatkampamāpuḥ prasthāne pārthivānāmaśivamiti puro bhāvi nāryaḥ śaśaṃsuḥ // 96 //
abhidhāya tadā tadapriyaṃ śiśupālo 'nuśayaṃ paraṃ gataḥ /
praṇataḥ śirasā kariṣyate sakalairetya samaṃ dharādhipaiḥ /
tava śāsanamāśu bhūpatiḥ paravānadya yatastvayaiva saḥ // 4 //
tava sarvavidheyavartinaḥ praṇatiṃ bibhrati kena bhūbhṛtaḥ // 5 //
calitānakadundubhiḥ puraḥ sabalastvaṃ saha sāraṇena tam /
iti joṣamavasthitaṃ dviṣaḥ praṇidhiṃ gāmabhidhāya sātyakiḥ /
prakaṭaṃ mṛdu nāma jalpataḥ paruṣaṃ sūcayatorthamantarā /
khalatāṃ khalatāmivāsatīṃ pratipadyeta kathaṃ budho janaḥ // 24 //
anuhuṅkurute ghanadhvaniṃ na hi gomāyurutāni kesarī // 25 //
vijitena jitasya durmatermatimadbhiḥ saha kā virodhitā // 26 //
vacanairasatāṃ mahīyaso na khalu vyeti gurutvamuddhataiḥ /
paritoṣayitā na kaścana svagato yasya guṇo 'sti dehinaḥ /
vaditā na laghīyaso 'paraḥ svaguṇaṃ tena vadatyasau svayam // 31 //
drutametu na hāpayiṣyate sadṛśaṃ tasya vidhātumuttaram // 33 //
yadapūri purā mahīpatirna mukhena svayamagasā śatam /
vivinakti na buddhidurvidhaḥ svayameva svahitaṃ pṛthagjanaḥ /
na paropahitaṃ na ca svataḥ pramimīte 'nubhavādṛte 'lpadhīḥ // 40 //
kuśalaṃ khalu tubhyameva tadvacanaṃ kṛṣṇa yadabhyadhāmaham /
tvayi bhaktimatā na satkṛtaḥ kururājā gurureva cedipaḥ /
abudhaiḥ kṛtamānasamvidastava pārthaiḥ kuta eva yogyatā /
sahasi plavagairupāsitaṃ na hi guñjāphalameti soṣmatām // 47 //
hṛtavatyapi bhīṣmakātmajāṃ tvayi cakṣāma samartha eva yat // 48 //
pralayollasitasya vāridheḥ parivāho jagataḥ karoti kim // 51 //
tadayaṃ samupaiti bhūpatiḥ payasāṃ pūra ivānivāritaḥ /
paripāti sa kevalaṃ śiśūniti tannāmani mā sma viśvasīḥ /
taruṇānapi rakṣati kṣamī sa śaraṇyaḥ śaraṇāgatāndviṣaḥ // 54 //
na vidadhyuraśaṅkamapriyaṃ mahataḥ svārthaparāḥ pare katham /
hitamapriyamicchasi śrutaṃ yadi saṃdhatsva purā na naśyasi /
grasate hi tamopahaṃ muhurnanu rāhvāhvamaharpatiṃ tamaḥ // 57 //
na bibheti raṇe harerapi kṣitipaḥ kā gaṇanāsya vṛṣṇiṣu // 59 //
na tadadbhutamasya yanmukhaṃ yudhi paśyanti bhiyā na śatravaḥ /
dravatāṃ nanu pṛṣṭhamīkṣate vadanaṃ so 'pi na jātu vidviṣām // 60 //
bhuvi samprati na pratiṣṭhitāḥ sadṛśā yasya surairarātayaḥ // 65 //
na cikīrṣati yaḥ smayoddhato nṛpatittaccaraṇopapagaṃ śiraḥ /
khanati kṣatasaṃhati kṣaṇādapi mūlāni mahānti kasyacit // 73 //
iti pūra ivodakasya yaḥ saritāṃ prāvṛṣijas taṭadrumaiḥ /
paritaḥ pramitākṣarāpi sarvaṃ viṣayaṃ vyāptavatī gatā pratiṣṭhām /
na khalu pratihanyate kutaścitparibhāṣeva garīyasī yadājñā // 80 //
bhūyāṃsa kvacidapi kāmamaskhalantastuṅgatvaṃ dadhati ca yadyapi dvaye 'pi /
kallolāḥ salilanidheravāpya pāraṃ śīryante na guṇamahormayastadīyāḥ // 82 //
lokālokavyāhataṃ gharmaraśmeḥ śālīnaṃ vā dhāma nālaṃ prasartum /
lokasyāgre paśyato dhṛṣṭamāśu krāmatyuccairbhūbhṛto yasya tejaḥ // 83 //
vicchittirnavacandanena vapuṣo bhinno 'dharo 'laktakair acchācche patitāñjane ca nayane śroṇyo 'lasanmekhalāḥ /
prāpto mauktikahāramunnatakucābhogastadīyadviṣām itthaṃ nityavibhūṣaṇā yuvatayaḥ saṃpatsu cāpatsvapi // 84 //
pracakṣubhe sapadi tadamburāśinā samaṃ mahāpralayasamudyataṃ sadaḥ // 1 //
ruṣāruṇīkṛtamapi tena tatkṣaṇaṃ nijaṃ vapuḥ punarayannijāṃ rucim // 4 //
samudyataṃ sapadi vadhāya vidviṣāmatikrudhaṃ niṣadhamanauṣadhaṃ janaḥ // 7 //
dhruvaṃ puraḥ saśaramamuṃ tṛtīyayā haro 'pi na vyasahata vīkṣituṃ dṛśā // 10 //
sa matsarasphuṭitavapurviniḥsṛtairbabhau ciraṃ nicita ivāsṛjāṃ lavaiḥ // 14 //
pratikṣaṇaṃ vidhuvati śāraṇe śiraḥ śikhidyutaḥ kanakakirīṭaraśmayaḥ /
samākule sadasi tathāpi vikriyāṃ mano 'gamanna murabhidaḥ paroditaiḥ /
parānamī yadapavadanta ātmanaḥ stuvanti ca sthitirasatāmasāviti /
nināya no vikṛtimavismitaḥ smitaṃ mukhaṃ śaracchaśadharamugdhamuddhavaḥ // 19 //
nirākṛte yadubhiriti prakopibhiḥ spaśe śanairgatavati tatra vidviṣām /
mahībhujāṃ mahimabhṛtāṃ na saṃmamurmudo 'ntarāvapuṣi bahiśca kañcukāḥ // 22 //
tvarāyujaḥ svayamapi kurvato nṛpāḥ punaḥ punastadadhikṛtānatatvaran // 23 //
adīyata dvipaghaṭayā savāribhiḥ karodaraiḥ svayamatha dānamakṣayam // 24 //
raṇaiṣiṇāṃ pulakabhṛto 'dhikandharaṃ lalambire sadasilatāḥ priyā iva // 25 //
pramodayannatha mukharānkalāpinaḥ pratiṣṭhate navaghanavadrathaḥ sma saḥ // 29 //
anārataṃ rasati jayāya dundubhau madhudviṣaḥ phaladalaghupratisvanaiḥ /
savikramakramaṇacalairitastataḥ prakīrṇakaiḥ kṣipata iva kṣite rajaḥ /
yataḥ puraḥ pratiripu śārṅgiṇaḥ svayaṃ vyadhīyata dvipaghaṭayeti maṅgalam // 39 //
na śūnyatāmagamadasau niveśabhūḥ prabhūtatāṃ dadhati bale calatyapi /
payasyabhidravati bhuvaṃ yugāvadhau saritpatirna hi samupaiti riktatām // 40 //
